column2: we both ordered the steak frites.  Again
column4: especially with the Bearnaise sauce.  My mistake was ordering it medium well because the edges were drier than I liked
column5: but that was my fault.  BF order his medium rare and couldn't stop raving about it.  I was too stuffed to make a dent in the fries
column7: but BF ate all of his and some of mine.
